title: Venous Ulcer and Compression Therapy: Constructivist-Based Online Education Course for Nurses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing knowledge and chronic wound management concepts
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented module integrated into graduate language education programs, emphasizing compression therapy techniques applicable to diverse clinical scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can select appropriate compression therapy techniques based on the clinical assessment of patients with venous ulcers
Learners can explain the theoretical rationale and evidence-based practice guidelines for compression therapy with over 80% accuracy
Learners can successfully perform the compression bandaging procedure three consecutive times in a virtual simulation environment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
